definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine

sentences.english: I'm coaching a hockey team here.
sentences.chinese: 我是一個冰球隊的教練。

sentences.english: He practices ice hockey hard, nobody knows how many hockey blades he has worn out.
sentences.chinese: 刻苦練習冰球，不知用壞了多少球刀。

sentences.english: Drag along an ice hockey with the mouse, the or so ambulation releases again a mouse.
sentences.chinese: 用鼠標拖住冰球，左右移動再放開鼠標。

sentences.english: Note 2. A men's ice hockey tournament was also held at the 1920 Summer Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 1920年夏季奧運會時也曾進行過男子冰球比賽。

sentences.english: Next to skiing, her favorite sport was ice-hockey.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜歡的運動是滑雪，其次是冰球。

sentences.english: Next to skiing her favourite sport was ice-hockey.
sentences.chinese: 她最喜愛的運動是滑雪，其次是冰球。

sentences.english: Professional hockey teams in Canada and the United States play in the NHL. This means the National Hockey League.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大和美國的職業冰球隊都在國家冰球聯盟裏打球。

sentences.english: Professional hockey teams in Canada and the United States play in the NHL. This means the National Hockey League.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大和美國的職業冰球隊都在國家冰球聯盟裏打球。

sentences.english: If China's hockey team beat Canada, wouldnt u have a few questions?
sentences.chinese: 如果中國冰球隊乾飯了加拿大隊，你也會被困擾到麼？

sentences.english: The powerful striker has little to regret after plumping for studs over skates.
sentences.chinese: 這位強大的前鋒對於放棄冰球選擇足球一點都不後悔。

sentences.english: Analysis of Types of Sports injuries in Elite Chinese Ice-hockey Players;
sentences.chinese: 我們有世界上最棒的花樣滑冰運動員和冰球隊。

sentences.english: Jeck: Do you watch ice hockey???
Then she noticed that she had fallen on top of the puck.
sentences.chinese: 然後，她才發現到自己剛好摔倒在冰球上面。

sentences.english: For example, cylindrical shapes such as hockey puck can need only two.
sentences.chinese: 例如，冰球等圓柱狀物體只需要兩視圖。

sentences.english: And the puck cleared out to center ice.
I played as a left-winger at ice hockey.
sentences.chinese: 我打冰球的時候是一名左邊鋒。

definition: football played with oval-shaped ball (rugby, American football, Australian rules etc)
skating or ice rink/ice stadium/ice arena
jade pot for cold water/curling (sport)/curling puck
